   16: 
   17: -module(presence_SUITE).
   18: -compile(export_all).
   19: 
   20: -include_lib("escalus/include/escalus.hrl").
   21: -include_lib("common_test/include/ct.hrl").
   22: 
   23: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
   24: %% Suite configuration
   25: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
   26: 
   27: all() ->
   28:     [{group, presence},
   29:      {group, presence_priority},
   30:      {group, roster},
   31:      {group, roster_versioning},
   32:      {group, subscribe_group}].
   33: 
   34: groups() ->
   35:     [{presence, [sequence], [available,
   36:                              available_direct,
   37:                              additions,
   38:                              invisible_presence]},
   39:      {presence_priority, [sequence], [negative_priority_presence]},
   40:      {roster, [sequence], [get_roster,
   41:                            add_contact,
   42:                            remove_contact]},
   43:      {roster_versioning, [sequence], [versioning,
   44:                                       versioning_no_store]},
   45:      {subscribe_group, [sequence], [subscribe,
   46:                                     subscribe_decline,
   47:                                     subscribe_relog,
   48:                                     unsubscribe,
   49:                                     remove_unsubscribe]}].
   50: 
   51: suite() ->
   52:     escalus:suite().
   53: 
   54: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
   55: %% Init & teardown
   56: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
   57: 
   58: init_per_suite(Config) ->
   59:     escalus:init_per_suite(Config).
   60: 
   61: end_per_suite(Config) ->
   62:     escalus:end_per_suite(Config).
   63: 
   64: init_per_group(_GroupName, Config) ->
   65:     escalus:create_users(Config, {by_name, [alice, bob]}).
   66: 
   67: end_per_group(_GroupName, Config) ->
   68:     escalus:delete_users(Config, {by_name, [alice, bob]}).
   69: 
   70: init_per_testcase(versioning, ConfigIn) ->
   71:     Config = set_versioning(true, true, ConfigIn),
   72:     escalus:init_per_testcase(versioning, Config);
   73: init_per_testcase(versioning_no_store, ConfigIn) ->
   74:     Config = set_versioning(true, false, ConfigIn),
   75:     escalus:init_per_testcase(versioning_no_store, Config);
   76: init_per_testcase(CaseName, Config) ->
   77:     escalus:init_per_testcase(CaseName, Config).
   78: 
   79: end_per_testcase(add_contact, Config) ->
   80:     [{_, UserSpec} | _] = escalus_config:get_config(escalus_users, Config),
   81:     remove_roster(Config, UserSpec),
   82:     escalus:end_per_testcase(add_contact, Config);
   83: end_per_testcase(subscribe, Config) ->
   84:     end_rosters_remove(Config);
   85: end_per_testcase(subscribe_decline, Config) ->
   86:     end_rosters_remove(Config);
   87: end_per_testcase(unsubscribe, Config) ->
   88:     end_rosters_remove(Config);
   89: end_per_testcase(VersionCases, Config)
   90:       when VersionCases =:= versioning; VersionCases =:= versioning_no_store ->
   91:     restore_versioning(Config),
   92:     end_rosters_remove(Config),
   93:     escalus:end_per_testcase(versioning, Config);
   94: end_per_testcase(CaseName, Config) ->
   95:     escalus:end_per_testcase(CaseName, Config).
   96: 
   97: end_rosters_remove(Config) ->
   98:     [{_, UserSpec1}, {_, UserSpec2} | _] =
   99:         escalus_config:get_config(escalus_users, Config),
  100:     remove_roster(Config, UserSpec1),
  101:     remove_roster(Config, UserSpec2),
  102:     escalus:end_per_testcase(subscription, Config).
  103: 
  104: 
  105: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
  106: %% Tests
  107: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
  108: 
  109: available(Config) ->
  110:     escalus:story(Config, [{alice, 1}, {bob, 1}], fun(Alice,_Bob) ->
  111: 
  112:         escalus:send(Alice, escalus_stanza:presence(<<"available">>)),
  113:         escalus:assert(is_presence, escalus:wait_for_stanza(Alice))
  114: 
  115:         end).
  116: 
  117: available_direct(Config) ->
  118:     escalus:story(Config, [{alice, 1}, {bob, 1}], fun(Alice,Bob) ->
  119: 
  120:         escalus:send(Alice, escalus_stanza:presence_direct(bob, <<"available">>)),
  121:         Received = escalus:wait_for_stanza(Bob),
  122:         escalus:assert(is_presence, Received),
  123:         escalus_assert:is_stanza_from(Alice, Received)
  124: 
  125:         end).
  126: 
  127: additions(Config) ->
  128:     escalus:story(Config, [{alice, 1}, {bob, 1}], fun(Alice,Bob) ->
  129: 
  130:         Tags = escalus_stanza:tags([
  131:             {<<"show">>, <<"dnd">>},
  132:             {<<"priority">>, <<"1">>},
  133:             {<<"status">>, <<"Short break">>}
  134:         ]),
  135:         Presence = escalus_stanza:presence_direct(bob, <<"available">>, Tags),
  136:         escalus:send(Alice, Presence),
  137: 
  138:         Received = escalus:wait_for_stanza(Bob),
  139:         escalus:assert(is_presence, Received),
  140:         escalus:assert(is_presence_with_show, [<<"dnd">>], Received),
  141:         escalus:assert(is_presence_with_status, [<<"Short break">>], Received),
  142:         escalus:assert(is_presence_with_priority, [<<"1">>], Received)
  143: 
  144:         end).
  145: 
  146: negative_priority_presence(Config) ->
  147:     escalus:story(Config, [{alice, 2}, {bob, 1}], fun(Alice1, Alice2, Bob) ->
  148: 
  149:         %% Alice1 updates presense priority
  150:         Tags = escalus_stanza:tags([
  151:             {<<"priority">>, <<"-10">>}
  152:         ]),
  153:         Presence = escalus_stanza:presence(<<"available">>, Tags),
  154:         escalus:send(Alice1, Presence),
  155: 
  156:         Received1 = escalus:wait_for_stanza(Alice1),
  157:         Received2 = escalus:wait_for_stanza(Alice2),
  158:         escalus:assert(is_presence, Received1),
  159:         escalus:assert(is_presence, Received2),
  160:         escalus:assert(is_presence_with_priority, [<<"-10">>], Received1),
  161:         escalus:assert(is_presence_with_priority, [<<"-10">>], Received2),
  162: 
  163:         %% Bob sends to the Alice's bare JID.
  164:         escalus:send(Bob, escalus_stanza:chat_to_short_jid(Alice1, <<"Hi.">>)),
  165: 
  166:         %% If priority is negative, than the client does not want to receive
  167:         %% any messages.
  168:         timer:sleep(1000),
  169:         escalus_assert:has_no_stanzas(Alice1)
  170: 
  171:         end).
  172: 
  173: invisible_presence(Config) ->
  174:     escalus:story(Config, [{alice, 1}, {bob, 1}], fun(Alice,Bob) ->
  175: 
  176:         %% Alice adds Bob as a contact
  177:         add_sample_contact(Alice, Bob),
  178: 
  179:         %% She subscribes to his presences
  180:         escalus:send(Alice, escalus_stanza:presence_direct(bob, <<"subscribe">>)),
  181:         PushReq = escalus:wait_for_stanza(Alice),
  182:         escalus:assert(is_roster_set, PushReq),
  183:         escalus:send(Alice, escalus_stanza:iq_result(PushReq)),
  184: 
  185:         %% Bob receives subscription reqest
  186:         Received = escalus:wait_for_stanza(Bob),
  187:         escalus:assert(is_presence_with_type, [<<"subscribe">>], Received),
  188: 
  189:         %% Bob adds new contact to his roster
  190:         escalus:send(Bob, escalus_stanza:roster_add_contact(Alice,
  191:                                                             [<<"enemies">>],
  192:                                                              <<"Alice">>)),
  193:         PushReqB = escalus:wait_for_stanza(Bob),
  194:         escalus:assert(is_roster_set, PushReqB),
  195:         escalus:send(Bob, escalus_stanza:iq_result(PushReqB)),
  196:         escalus:assert(is_iq_result, escalus:wait_for_stanza(Bob)),
  197: 
  198:         %% Bob sends subscribed presence
  199:         escalus:send(Bob, escalus_stanza:presence_direct(alice, <<"subscribed">>)),
  200: 
  201:         %% Alice receives subscribed
  202:         Stanzas = escalus:wait_for_stanzas(Alice, 2),
  203: 
  204:         check_subscription_stanzas(Stanzas, <<"subscribed">>),
  205:         escalus:assert(is_presence, escalus:wait_for_stanza(Alice)),
  206: 
  207:         %% Bob receives roster push
  208:         PushReqB1 = escalus:wait_for_stanza(Bob),
  209:         escalus:assert(is_roster_set, PushReqB1),
  210: 
  211:         %% Bob sends presence
  212:         escalus:send(Bob, escalus_stanza:presence(<<"available">>)),
  213:         escalus:assert(is_presence, escalus:wait_for_stanza(Alice)),
  214: 
  215:         %% Bob becomes invisible
  216:         escalus:send(Bob, escalus_stanza:presence(<<"invisible">>)),
  217: 
  218:         escalus:assert(is_presence_with_type, [<<"unavailable">>],
  219:                        escalus:wait_for_stanza(Alice)),
  220: 
  221:         %% Return everything back
  222:         escalus:send(Bob, escalus_stanza:presence(<<"available">>)),
  223:         escalus:assert(is_presence, escalus:wait_for_stanza(Alice))
  224: 
  225:         end).
  226: 
  227: get_roster(Config) ->
  228:     escalus:story(Config, [{alice, 1}, {bob, 1}], fun(Alice,_Bob) ->
  229:         escalus:send(Alice, escalus_stanza:roster_get()),
  230:         escalus_assert:is_roster_result(escalus:wait_for_stanza(Alice))
  231: 
  232:         end).
  233: 
  234: add_contact(Config) ->
  235:     escalus:story(Config, [{alice, 1}, {bob, 1}], fun(Alice, Bob) ->
  236: 
  237:         %% add contact
  238:         Stanza = escalus_stanza:roster_add_contact(Bob, [<<"friends">>], <<"Bobby">>),
  239:         escalus:send(Alice, Stanza),
  240:         Received = escalus:wait_for_stanzas(Alice, 2),
  241:         escalus:assert_many([is_roster_set, is_iq_result], Received),
  242: 
  243:         Result = hd([R || R <- Received, escalus_pred:is_roster_set(R)]),
  244:         escalus:assert(count_roster_items, [1], Result),
  245:         escalus:send(Alice, escalus_stanza:iq_result(Result)),
  246: 
  247:         %% check roster
  248:         escalus:send(Alice, escalus_stanza:roster_get()),
  249:         Received2 = escalus:wait_for_stanza(Alice),
  250: 
  251:         escalus:assert(is_roster_result, Received2),
  252:         escalus:assert(roster_contains, [bob], Received2)
  253: 
  254:         end).
  255: 
  256: remove_contact(Config) ->
  257:     escalus:story(Config, [{alice, 1}, {bob, 1}], fun(Alice, Bob) ->
  258: 
  259:         %% add contact
  260:         add_sample_contact(Alice, Bob),
  261: 
  262:         %% check roster
  263:         escalus:send(Alice, escalus_stanza:roster_get()),
  264:         escalus:assert(count_roster_items, [1], escalus:wait_for_stanza(Alice)),
  265: 
  266:         %% remove contact
  267:         escalus:send(Alice, escalus_stanza:roster_remove_contact(Bob)),
  268:         escalus:assert_many([is_roster_set, is_iq_result],
  269:                             escalus:wait_for_stanzas(Alice, 2)),
  270: 
  271:         %% check roster
  272:         escalus:send(Alice, escalus_stanza:roster_get()),
  273:         escalus:assert(count_roster_items, [0], escalus:wait_for_stanza(Alice))
  274: 
  275:     end).
  276: 
  277: versioning(Config) ->
  278:     escalus:story(Config, [{alice, 1}, {bob, 1}], fun(Alice, Bob) ->
  279: 
  280:         escalus:send(Alice, escalus_stanza:roster_get(<<"">>)),
  281:         RosterResult = escalus:wait_for_stanza(Alice),
  282: 
  283:         escalus_assert:is_roster_result(RosterResult),
  284:         Ver = exml_query:path(RosterResult, [{element, <<"query">>}, {attr, <<"ver">>}]),
  285: 
  286:         true = Ver /= undefined,
  287: 
  288:         %% add contact
  289:         Stanza = escalus_stanza:roster_add_contact(Bob, [<<"friends">>], <<"Bobby">>),
  290:         escalus:send(Alice, Stanza),
  291:         Received = escalus:wait_for_stanzas(Alice, 2),
  292: 
  293:         escalus:assert_many([is_roster_set, is_iq_result], Received),
  294: 
  295:         RosterSet = hd(Received),
  296: 
  297:         Ver2 = exml_query:path(RosterSet, [{element, <<"query">>}, {attr, <<"ver">>}]),
  298: 
  299:         true = Ver2 /= undefined,
  300: 
  301:         Result = hd([R || R <- Received, escalus_pred:is_roster_set(R)]),
  302:         escalus:assert(count_roster_items, [1], Result),
  303:         escalus:send(Alice, escalus_stanza:iq_result(Result)),
  304: 
  305:         %% check roster, send old ver
  306:         escalus:send(Alice, escalus_stanza:roster_get(Ver)),
  307:         Received2 = escalus:wait_for_stanza(Alice),
  308: 
  309:         escalus:assert(is_roster_result, Received2),
  310:         escalus:assert(roster_contains, [bob], Received2),
  311: 
  312:         %% check version
  313: 
  314:         Ver2 = exml_query:path(Received2, [{element, <<"query">>}, {attr, <<"ver">>}]),
  315: 
  316:         %% check roster, send correct Ver
  317: 
  318:         escalus:send(Alice, escalus_stanza:roster_get(Ver2)),
  319:         Received3 = escalus:wait_for_stanza(Alice),
  320: 
  321:         escalus:assert(is_iq_result, Received3),
  322: 
  323:         %% There is no content as version matches
  324: 
  325:         undefined = exml_query:path(Received3, [{element, <<"query">>}])
  326: 
  327:     end).
  328: 
  329: versioning_no_store(Config) ->
  330:     versioning(Config).
  331: 
  332: subscribe(Config) ->
  333:     escalus:story(Config, [{alice, 1}, {bob, 1}], fun(Alice, Bob) ->
  334: 
  335:         %% Alice adds Bob as a contact
  336:         add_sample_contact(Alice, Bob),
  337: 
  338:         %% She subscribes to his presences
  339:         escalus:send(Alice, escalus_stanza:presence_direct(bob, <<"subscribe">>)),
  340:         PushReq = escalus:wait_for_stanza(Alice),
  341:         escalus:assert(is_roster_set, PushReq),
  342:         escalus:send(Alice, escalus_stanza:iq_result(PushReq)),
  343: 
  344:         %% Bob receives subscription reqest
  345:         Received = escalus:wait_for_stanza(Bob),
  346:         escalus:assert(is_presence_with_type, [<<"subscribe">>], Received),
  347: 
  348:         %% Bob adds new contact to his roster
  349:         escalus:send(Bob, escalus_stanza:roster_add_contact(Alice,
  350:                                                             [<<"enemies">>],
  351:                                                              <<"Alice">>)),
  352:         PushReqB = escalus:wait_for_stanza(Bob),
  353:         escalus:assert(is_roster_set, PushReqB),
  354:         escalus:send(Bob, escalus_stanza:iq_result(PushReqB)),
  355:         escalus:assert(is_iq_result, escalus:wait_for_stanza(Bob)),
  356: 
  357:         %% Bob sends subscribed presence
  358:         escalus:send(Bob, escalus_stanza:presence_direct(alice, <<"subscribed">>)),
  359: 
  360:         %% Alice receives subscribed
  361:         Stanzas = escalus:wait_for_stanzas(Alice, 2),
  362: 
  363:         check_subscription_stanzas(Stanzas, <<"subscribed">>),
  364:         escalus:assert(is_presence, escalus:wait_for_stanza(Alice)),
  365: 
  366:         %% Bob receives roster push
  367:         PushReqB1 = escalus:wait_for_stanza(Bob),
  368:         escalus:assert(is_roster_set, PushReqB1),
  369: 
  370:         %% Bob sends presence
  371:         escalus:send(Bob, escalus_stanza:presence(<<"available">>)),
  372:         escalus:assert(is_presence, escalus:wait_for_stanza(Alice)),
  373: 
  374:         %% Bob sends presence
  375:         escalus:send(Bob, escalus_stanza:presence(<<"unavailable">>)),
  376:         escalus:assert(is_presence_with_type, [<<"unavailable">>],
  377:                        escalus:wait_for_stanza(Alice))
  378: 
  379:         end).
  380: 
  381: subscribe_decline(Config) ->
  382:     escalus:story(Config, [{alice, 1}, {bob, 1}], fun(Alice,Bob) ->
  383: 
  384:         %% add contact
  385:         add_sample_contact(Alice, Bob),
  386: 
  387:         %% subscribe
  388:         escalus:send(Alice, escalus_stanza:presence_direct(bob, <<"subscribe">>)),
  389:         PushReq = escalus:wait_for_stanza(Alice),
  390:         escalus_assert:is_roster_set(PushReq),
  391:         escalus:send(Alice, escalus_stanza:iq_result(PushReq)),
  392: 
  393:         %% Bob receives subscription reqest
  394:         Received = escalus:wait_for_stanza(Bob),
  395:         escalus:assert(is_presence_with_type, [<<"subscribe">>], Received),
  396: 
  397:         %% Bob refuses subscription
  398:         escalus:send(Bob, escalus_stanza:presence_direct(alice, <<"unsubscribed">>)),
  399: 
  400:         %% Alice receives subscribed
  401:         Stanzas = escalus:wait_for_stanzas(Alice, 2),
  402: 
  403:         check_subscription_stanzas(Stanzas, <<"unsubscribed">>)
  404: 
  405:     end).
  406: 
  407: subscribe_relog(Config) ->
  408:     escalus:story(Config, [{alice, 1}, {bob, 1}], fun(Alice, Bob) ->
  409: 
  410:         %% Alice adds Bob as a contact
  411:         add_sample_contact(Alice, Bob),
  412: 
  413:         %% She subscribes to his presences
  414:         escalus:send(Alice, escalus_stanza:presence_direct(bob, <<"subscribe">>)),
  415:         PushReq = escalus:wait_for_stanza(Alice),
  416:         escalus:assert(is_roster_set, PushReq),
  417:         escalus:send(Alice, escalus_stanza:iq_result(PushReq)),
  418: 
  419:         %% Bob receives subscription reqest
  420:         Received = escalus:wait_for_stanza(Bob),
  421:         escalus:assert(is_presence_with_type, [<<"subscribe">>], Received),
  422: 
  423:         %% New Bob resource connects, should receive subscription request again
  424:         {ok, NewBob} = escalus_client:start_for(Config, bob, <<"newbob">>),
  425:         escalus:send(NewBob,
  426:             escalus_stanza:presence(<<"available">>)),
  427: 
  428:         escalus:assert(is_presence_with_type, [<<"available">>],
  429:                        escalus:wait_for_stanza(Bob)),
  430: 
  431:         Stanzas = escalus:wait_for_stanzas(NewBob, 3),
  432:         3 = length(Stanzas),
  433: 
  434:         escalus_new_assert:mix_match([
  435:                 fun(S) ->
  436:                     escalus_pred:is_presence_with_type(<<"available">>, S)
  437:                     andalso escalus_pred:is_stanza_from(Bob, S)
  438:                 end,
  439:                 fun(S) ->
  440:                     escalus_pred:is_presence_with_type(<<"available">>, S)
  441:                     andalso escalus_pred:is_stanza_from(NewBob, S)
  442:                 end,
  443:                 fun(S) ->
  444:                     escalus_pred:is_presence_with_type(<<"subscribe">>, S)
  445:                     andalso escalus_pred:is_stanza_from(alice, S)
  446:                 end
  447:             ], Stanzas),
  448: 
  449:         escalus_client:stop(NewBob),
  450: 
  451:         escalus:send(Bob, escalus_stanza:presence_direct(alice, <<"unsubscribed">>))
  452: 
  453:         end).
  454: 
  455: unsubscribe(Config) ->
  456:     escalus:story(Config, [{alice, 1}, {bob, 1}], fun(Alice,Bob) ->
  457: 
  458:         %% add contact
  459:         add_sample_contact(Alice, Bob),
  460: 
  461:         %% subscribe
  462:         escalus:send(Alice, escalus_stanza:presence_direct(bob, <<"subscribe">>)),
  463:         PushReq = escalus:wait_for_stanza(Alice),
  464:         escalus:send(Alice, escalus_stanza:iq_result(PushReq)),
  465: 
  466:         %% Bob receives subscription reqest
  467:         escalus:assert(is_presence_with_type, [<<"subscribe">>],
  468:                        escalus:wait_for_stanza(Bob)),
  469:         %% Bob adds new contact to his roster
  470:         escalus:send(Bob, escalus_stanza:roster_add_contact(Alice,
  471:                                                             [<<"enemies">>],
  472:                                                              <<"Alice">>)),
  473:         PushReqB = escalus:wait_for_stanza(Bob),
  474:         escalus:send(Bob, escalus_stanza:iq_result(PushReqB)),
  475:         escalus:assert(is_iq_result, escalus:wait_for_stanza(Bob)),
  476: 
  477:         %% Bob sends subscribed presence
  478:         escalus:send(Bob, escalus_stanza:presence_direct(alice, <<"subscribed">>)),
  479: 
  480:         %% Alice receives subscribed
  481:         Stanzas = escalus:wait_for_stanzas(Alice, 2),
  482: 
  483:         check_subscription_stanzas(Stanzas, <<"subscribed">>),
  484:         escalus:assert(is_presence, escalus:wait_for_stanza(Alice)),
  485: 
  486:         %% Bob receives roster push
  487:         PushReqB1 = escalus:wait_for_stanza(Bob),
  488:         escalus_assert:is_roster_set(PushReqB1),
  489: 
  490:         %% Alice sends unsubscribe
  491:         escalus:send(Alice, escalus_stanza:presence_direct(bob, <<"unsubscribe">>)),
  492: 
  493:         PushReqA2 = escalus:wait_for_stanza(Alice),
  494:         escalus_assert:is_roster_set(PushReqA2),
  495:         escalus:send(Alice, escalus_stanza:iq_result(PushReqA2)),
  496: 
  497:         %% Bob receives unsubscribe
  498: 
  499:         StanzasB = escalus:wait_for_stanzas(Bob, 2),
  500: 
  501:         check_subscription_stanzas(StanzasB, <<"unsubscribe">>),
  502: 
  503:         %% Alice receives unsubscribed
  504:         escalus:assert(is_presence_with_type, [<<"unavailable">>],
  505:                        escalus:wait_for_stanza(Alice))
  506:     end).
  507: 
  508: remove_unsubscribe(Config) ->
  509:     escalus:story(Config, [{alice, 1}, {bob, 1}], fun(Alice,Bob) ->
  510:         %% add contact
  511:         add_sample_contact(Alice, Bob),
  512: 
  513:         %% subscribe
  514:         escalus:send(Alice, escalus_stanza:presence_direct(bob, <<"subscribe">>)),
  515:         PushReq = escalus:wait_for_stanza(Alice),
  516:         escalus:send(Alice, escalus_stanza:iq_result(PushReq)),
  517: 
  518:         %% Bob receives subscription reqest
  519:         escalus:assert(is_presence_with_type, [<<"subscribe">>],
  520:                        escalus:wait_for_stanza(Bob)),
  521:         %% Bob adds new contact to his roster
  522:         escalus:send(Bob, escalus_stanza:roster_add_contact(Alice,
  523:                                                             [<<"enemies">>],
  524:                                                             <<"Alice">>)),
  525:         PushReqB = escalus:wait_for_stanza(Bob),
  526:         escalus:send(Bob, escalus_stanza:iq_result(PushReqB)),
  527:         escalus:assert(is_iq_result, escalus:wait_for_stanza(Bob)),
  528: 
  529:         %% Bob sends subscribed presence
  530:         escalus:send(Bob, escalus_stanza:presence_direct(alice, <<"subscribed">>)),
  531: 
  532:         %% Alice receives subscribed
  533:         Stanzas = [escalus:wait_for_stanza(Alice),
  534:                    escalus:wait_for_stanza(Alice)],
  535: 
  536:         check_subscription_stanzas(Stanzas, <<"subscribed">>),
  537:         escalus:assert(is_presence, escalus:wait_for_stanza(Alice)),
  538: 
  539:         %% Bob receives roster push
  540:         PushReqB1 = escalus:wait_for_stanza(Bob),
  541:         escalus_assert:is_roster_set(PushReqB1),
  542: 
  543:         %% remove contact
  544:         escalus:send(Alice, escalus_stanza:roster_remove_contact(Bob)),
  545: 
  546:         IsPresUnavailable =
  547:                 fun(S) ->
  548:                     escalus_pred:is_presence_with_type(<<"unavailable">>, S)
  549:                 end,
  550:         escalus:assert_many([is_roster_set, is_iq_result, IsPresUnavailable],
  551:                             escalus:wait_for_stanzas(Alice, 3)),
  552:         check_subscription_stanzas(escalus:wait_for_stanzas(Bob, 2),
  553:                                    <<"unsubscribe">>)
  554: 
  555:     end).
  556: 
  557: 
  558: %%-----------------------------------------------------------------
  559: %% Helpers
  560: %%-----------------------------------------------------------------
  561: 
  562: add_sample_contact(Alice, Bob) ->
  563:     escalus:send(Alice, escalus_stanza:roster_add_contact(Bob,
  564:                                                           [<<"friends">>],
  565:                                                           <<"Bobby">>)),
  566: 
  567:     Received = escalus:wait_for_stanzas(Alice, 2),
  568:     escalus:assert_many([is_roster_set, is_iq_result], Received),
  569: 
  570:     Result = hd([R || R <- Received, escalus_pred:is_roster_set(R)]),
  571:     escalus:assert(count_roster_items, [1], Result),
  572:     escalus:send(Alice, escalus_stanza:iq_result(Result)).
  573: 
  574: check_subscription_stanzas(Stanzas, Type) ->
  575:     IsPresWithType = fun(S) ->
  576:                          escalus_pred:is_presence_with_type(Type, S)
  577:                      end,
  578:     escalus:assert_many([is_roster_set, IsPresWithType], Stanzas).
  579: 
  580: remove_roster(Config, UserSpec) ->
  581:     [Username, Server, _Pass] = [escalus_ejabberd:unify_str_arg(Item) ||
  582:                                  Item <- escalus_users:get_usp(Config, UserSpec)],
  583:     Mods = escalus_ejabberd:rpc(gen_mod, loaded_modules, [Server]),
  584:     case lists:member(mod_roster, Mods) of
  585:         true ->
  586:             {atomic, _} = escalus_ejabberd:rpc(mod_roster, remove_user, [Username, Server]);
  587:         false ->
  588:             case lists:member(mod_roster_odbc, Mods) of
  589:                 true ->
  590:                     ok = escalus_ejabberd:rpc(mod_roster_odbc, remove_user, [Username, Server]);
  591:                 false ->
  592:                     throw(roster_not_loaded)
  593:             end
  594:     end.
  595: 
  596: set_versioning(Versioning, VersionStore, Config) ->
  597:     Host = escalus_ct:get_config(ejabberd_domain),
  598:     RosterVersioning = escalus_ejabberd:rpc(gen_mod, get_module_opt, [Host, mod_roster, versioning, false]),
  599:     RosterVersionOnDb = escalus_ejabberd:rpc(gen_mod, get_module_opt, [Host, mod_roster, store_current_id, false]),
  600:     escalus_ejabberd:rpc(gen_mod, set_module_opt, [Host, mod_roster, versioning, Versioning]),
  601:     escalus_ejabberd:rpc(gen_mod, set_module_opt, [Host, mod_roster, store_current_id, VersionStore]),
  602:     [{versioning, RosterVersioning}, {store_current_id, RosterVersionOnDb} | Config].
  603: 
  604: restore_versioning(Config) ->
  605:     Host = escalus_ct:get_config(ejabberd_domain),
  606:     RosterVersioning = proplists:get_value(versioning, Config),
  607:     RosterVersionOnDb = proplists:get_value(store_current_id, Config),
  608:     escalus_ejabberd:rpc(gen_mod, get_module_opt, [Host, mod_roster, versioning, RosterVersioning]),
  609:     escalus_ejabberd:rpc(gen_mod, get_module_opt, [Host, mod_roster, store_current_id, RosterVersionOnDb]).
